name: wotd
description: WOTD is a simple TypeScript script to download the published word of the day by RAE

scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run build && node dist/main.js
scripts.pack: npm run clean && npm run build && pkg --out-path release .
scripts.linuxPack: npm run clean && npm run build && pkg -t node12-linux-x64 --out-path release .
scripts.macosPack: npm run clean && npm run build && pkg -t node12-macos-x64 --out-path release .
scripts.winPack: npm run clean && npm run build && pkg -t node12-win-x64 --out-path release .

author: raaowx
